column4: i ordered ubuntu 5.04 cds with the shipit service, will i recieve breezy cds without any additional effort? (couldn't seem to log in to my account, so i wondered if ubuntu's gotten a new account system or something)
I think they will be breezy
i mean, like, i did recieve hoary cds, but will i also recieve breezy when they're ready for takeoff?
oh, you proabably have to order again if you already recieved cds
